vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βεελζεβούλ (WH, App., 159, Rec., βεελζεβούλ), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. בַּעַל, lord, and the Talmudic זִבּוּל, from זֶבֶל, dung (Dalman, Gr., 137.n), or perh. זִבֻל, habitation, but, see DB, iv, 409f.; DCG, i, 181). The AV, RV, Beelzebub, comes through Vg. from 4Ki.1:2, בַּעַל זִבוּב, lord of flies (LXX, βάαλ μυῖα, Sm., βεελζεβούβ),
Beelzebul, Beelzebub, a name of Satan: Mat.10:25 12:24, 27 Mrk.3:22, Luk.11:15, 18 19.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Beelzebub, "lord [baal] of the flies"
variant spellings of Βεελζεβούβ and βεελζεβούλ, Beelzeboul, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 10:25
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
別西卜 这个陽性專有名詞在亞蘭文的意思是 "蒼蠅之主"
原為非利士神祇,在新約是指邪靈的首腦
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
别西卜 这个阳性专有名词在亚兰文的意思是 "苍蝇之主"
原为非利士神祇,在新约是指邪灵的首脑
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Trùm quỷ / Bê-ên-xê-bun. Tên Bê-ên-xê-bun có thể phát xuất từ tên thần Ba-anh trong Cựu Ước. Xem H1176
